markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Free Action" />command ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** You deal 1d10 negative damage to yourself. If your next action is to Strike with the scythe or to Cast a Spell with the [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or negative trait, that Strike or spell deals additional negative damage equal to the damage you took (after any reductions or increases from immunity, resistances, weaknesses).
name: command (divine, necromancy, negative)

If your next action is to Strike with the scythe or to Cast a Spell with the disease or negative trait, that Strike or spell deals additional negative damage equal to the damage you took (after any reductions or increases from immunity, resistances, weaknesses).
